requirement_tested: Implement a search functionality allowing users to input stock codes or names
user_persona: A new investor looking to explore stock information quickly.
user_goal: To find and view the report for a specific stock by typing its name or symbol.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Search Bar
narrative_steps.description: Sarah opens the website and immediately sees the centrally located search bar. She wants to look up Apple Inc.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the search bar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The cursor focuses in the search bar, ready for input.

narrative_steps.title: Entering Stock Name
narrative_steps.description: Sarah starts typing 'Apple' into the search field hoping to find relevant results.
narrative_steps.action: Type 'Apple' into the search bar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Text appears in the search bar as typed.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Search Query
narrative_steps.description: After typing, Sarah presses Enter to initiate her search for Apple-related stocks.
narrative_steps.action: Press the Enter key.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The system processes the query and displays results or triggers further actions like auto-suggestions.

requirement_tested: Provide auto-suggest or dropdown functionality for stock search input
user_persona: An experienced trader who knows stock symbols but wants quick confirmation.
user_goal: To efficiently select the correct stock from a list of suggestions while searching.

narrative_steps.title: Typing Partial Symbol
narrative_steps.description: Mark begins typing 'AAPL' in the search bar, expecting Apple's stock to appear in suggestions.
narrative_steps.action: Type 'AAPL' into the search bar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A dropdown menu appears below the search bar showing suggested matches including 'AAPL - Apple Inc.'

narrative_steps.title: Hovering Over Suggestion
narrative_steps.description: Mark moves his mouse over the first suggestion to verify it’s the one he wants.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over the 'AAPL - Apple Inc.' suggestion.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The suggestion is highlighted visually without being selected yet.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting Correct Stock
narrative_steps.description: Confident it's the right result, Mark clicks on the suggestion to proceed.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'AAPL - Apple Inc.' suggestion.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The search bar is populated with 'AAPL', and the focus shifts toward generating a report.

requirement_tested: Include options for users to select report formats (PDF, HTML, etc.)
user_persona: A financial analyst preparing documents for client presentations.
user_goal: To choose an appropriate format for exporting the generated stock report.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Format Options
narrative_steps.description: Lisa notices the toggle buttons for choosing between PDF and HTML after selecting a stock.
narrative_steps.action: Observe the PDF and HTML toggle buttons.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Both buttons are visible and styled consistently with navy borders.

narrative_steps.title: Choosing Preferred Format
narrative_steps.description: Lisa prefers to share editable content, so she selects the HTML option.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'HTML' toggle button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The 'HTML' button becomes active with a navy fill, and the 'PDF' button returns to default styling.

requirement_tested: Enable users to customize report content sections and parameters
user_persona: A researcher interested only in financial data and historical prices.
user_goal: To tailor the report to show only the most relevant information for analysis.

narrative_steps.title: Opening Customization Panel
narrative_steps.description: James looks for ways to refine the report and clicks the 'Report Customization' header.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Report Customization' title.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The customization sidebar expands revealing various checkboxes and sliders.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting Relevant Sections
narrative_steps.description: James checks boxes for 'Financial Data' and 'Historical Prices' while leaving others unchecked.
narrative_steps.action: Click the checkboxes next to 'Financial Data' and 'Historical Prices'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Those two sections are now marked for inclusion in the final report.

narrative_steps.title: Adjusting Parameters
narrative_steps.description: He drags the slider for historical data range to cover the last 12 months.
narrative_steps.action: Drag the date range slider to 12 months.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Slider position updates accordingly, indicating the adjusted timeframe.

requirement_tested: Generate automated stock reports based on user-selected criteria
user_persona: A busy portfolio manager needing quick insights.
user_goal: To get a customized report instantly after making selections.

narrative_steps.title: Initiating Report Generation
narrative_steps.description: Patricia has made all her selections and now wants to generate the report.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Generate Report' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A loading spinner appears in the main content area while the report compiles.

narrative_steps.title: Waiting for Completion
narrative_steps.description: She waits briefly as the system gathers data and formats the report per her choices.
narrative_steps.action: Wait for the loading process to finish.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The loading spinner disappears and the fully generated report appears in the main content area.

requirement_tested: Display basic stock information including company name, ticker symbol, and current price
user_persona: A casual observer wanting a snapshot of a company's identity and value.
user_goal: To see essential identifying details of the selected stock at a glance.

narrative_steps.title: Reviewing Basic Info Card
narrative_steps.description: Robert reviews the top of the report where basic company information is displayed.
narrative_steps.action: Look at the basic info card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The card clearly shows the company name, ticker symbol, and current price in navy font on a white background.

requirement_tested: Show market trend analysis with charts or graphs
user_persona: A day trader evaluating short-term momentum.
user_goal: To visualize recent performance trends to inform buying decisions.

narrative_steps.title: Examining Trend Graph
narrative_steps.description: Dana studies the line graph depicting the stock’s price movement over the past month.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over different points on the trend line.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Tooltip displays precise price and timestamp for each hovered point.

narrative_steps.title: Switching Time Intervals
narrative_steps.description: Curious about longer patterns, Dana switches the chart view to weekly intervals.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Weekly' interval button beneath the chart.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Chart updates to reflect weekly price movements instead of daily ones.

requirement_tested: Present financial data including revenue, earnings, and key ratios
user_persona: A fundamental analyst assessing business health.
user_goal: To evaluate core financial metrics systematically.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting Financial Table
narrative_steps.description: Emily scrolls down to the financial data table and reads through key figures.
narrative_steps.action: Scan the tabular financial data section.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Clear presentation of revenue, EPS, P/E ratio, and other important metrics.

narrative_steps.title: Sorting Columns
narrative_steps.description: Wanting to compare values easily, Emily sorts the revenue column descending.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Revenue' column header.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Table reorders rows showing highest revenues first.

user_persona: An investor analyzing long-term investment potential.
user_goal: To understand how the stock has performed historically.

narrative_steps.title: Exploring Historical Chart
narrative_steps.description: Michael examines the multi-year historical price chart rendered as candlesticks.
narrative_steps.action: Use mouse scroll to zoom into a specific year.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Chart zooms in to show more detail for the selected period.

narrative_steps.title: Highlighting Period of Interest
narrative_steps.description: Intrigued by a dip, Michael drags across the timeline to isolate that segment.
narrative_steps.action: Drag-select a portion of the timeline.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Selected period is highlighted for closer examination.

requirement_tested: Provide real-time or delayed stock price updates
user_goal: To stay informed about current pricing conditions.

narrative_steps.title: Monitoring Price Updates
narrative_steps.description: Olivia watches the current price update periodically in the basic info card.
narrative_steps.action: Observe the price indicator over time.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Price refreshes every minute, accompanied by a 'Real-Time' or 'Delayed' tag.

requirement_tested: Offer report customization options for different user requirements
user_persona: A marketing executive preparing branded materials.
user_goal: To preview and apply layout customizations before finalizing the report.

narrative_steps.title: Applying Template Changes
narrative_steps.description: Benjamin makes adjustments in the customization panel and wants to preview them.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Apply Template' button in the customization preview pane.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Preview panel instantly reflects the newly applied template settings.

requirement_tested: Implement a clean user interface with white background and navy component colors
user_goal: To ensure the site maintains brand-aligned aesthetics.

narrative_steps.title: Assessing Visual Consistency
narrative_steps.description: Taylor scans the entire interface to check for adherence to the specified color scheme.
narrative_steps.action: Visually inspect the overall interface design.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All components feature a white background with navy accents as described.

requirement_tested: Ensure responsive design for desktop and mobile viewing
user_persona: A commuter checking stock info on a smartphone.
user_goal: To navigate and use the platform seamlessly on a mobile device.

narrative_steps.title: Using Mobile Navigation
narrative_steps.description: On his phone, Kevin taps the hamburger menu icon to access navigation links.
narrative_steps.action: Click the hamburger menu icon.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Collapsible menu slides out smoothly, covering part of the main content.

requirement_tested: Include error handling for invalid stock codes or unavailable data
user_persona: A beginner user prone to typos.
user_goal: To receive helpful guidance when entering incorrect stock identifiers.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Invalid Input
narrative_steps.description: Trying to be quick, Rachel mistakenly enters 'XYZABC' in the search bar and hits enter.
narrative_steps.action: Enter 'XYZABC' and press Enter.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: An inline error message appears stating 'Sorry, no results found for XYZABC. Please check spelling or try another symbol.'

requirement_tested: Provide report export or download functionality
user_persona: A student needing to submit a printed assignment.
user_goal: To download the completed report for offline use.

narrative_steps.title: Locating Download Option
narrative_steps.description: After finishing her research, Emma finds the 'Download Report' button at the end of the document.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Download Report' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Browser prompts her to choose a location and confirm download of the selected report format.
